snippet: Patients infected with H.I.V. are being ordered out of hospitals in Yemen, even when they are in dire need of care, a human rights group says.
abstract: Human Rights Watch reports that HIV-infected patients in Yemen are being ordered out of hospitals at times when they are in dire need of care.
lead_paragraph: Patients infected with H.I.V. are being ordered out of hospitals in Yemen, even when they are in dire need of care, a human rights group says.

headline.print_headline: H.I.V. Patients in Yemen Face Hospital Evictions
headline.main: H.I.V. Patients in Yemen Face Hospital Evictions

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
